sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import ProductTable from "../Snippets/ProductTable" function Checkout() { const [cart] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart'))) const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { let total = 0 cart.map(product => { total += parseInt(product.product.price) }) setTotal(total) }, []) if(cart.length === 0) { return(
Your cart is empty
continue shopping
) } return(
Checkout
Returns on store
Free shipping over $250
Total Order
Subtotal
${ total }
Delivery
$5
To Pay
${ total + 5 }
) } export default Checkout
